name: Maruti Alto K10
description: The price of Maruti Alto K10, a 5 seater Hatchback, ranges from Rs. 3.99  - 5.96 Lakh. It is available in 8 variants, with an engine of 998 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Alto K10 has an NCAP rating of 2 stars and comes with 2 airbags. Maruti Alto K10 is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 24.39 to 33.85 kmpl for Alto K10.
